description:
Replacement pads for your Shimano Alfine, SLX, XT and XTR disc brake systems.

  • Metal pads are hard-wearing and powerful
  • Finned backing plate helps with heat dissipation
  • Compatible with Shimano® BR-M9020, BR-M9000, BR-M8000 and BR-M7000, as well as any other Shimano calipers that use J Type pads
name: Shimano J04C Metal Disc Brake Pads
